title: Bug 118780: Incorrect column names displayed in expression builder after setting aliases for columns in a dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the original column names are still displayed instead of the assigned aliases.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting a dataset, the column names should be displayed according to the assigned aliases. When double-clicking on the first column name, it should show the alias name, not the original name.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select a dataset that has aliases set for its columns.
3. Double-click on the first column name.
4. Verify that the alias name is displayed, not the original name.
